headline: 2 No-Brainer Steel Stocks to Buy With $2,000 Right Now
summary: Nucor and Steel Dynamics are differentiated steel makers in the U.S. market.  Resilient businesses have allowed both Nucor and Steel Dynamics to increase dividends regularly.  The best time to buy Nucor and Steel Dynamics is when investors are pessimistic about steel, which is exactly the situation today.
